name: Get Those Votes!
description:
With 30 days left in the election, you need to earn as many votes as you can, to become…

The President of the United States of Omerica!

Drive around the  country and do political stuff like:

  • Run political ads
  • Hold Rallies
  • Get money from fundraising
  • Visit disaster sites for free publicity

You decide if you want to stick to the issues (especially if you align with the local voters), or attack your opponent’s weaknesses (which can potentially backfire).

At the end, the polls will determine who wins the Electoral votes for each state.

Good Luck!

(Original version created for Ludum Dare 47)
